# Question 4 

```{r}
systems |> 
  summarise("nb of observations" = nrow(systems), "nb of variables" = ncol(systems))|>
  mutate("nb of obs with at least one NA" = sum(rowSums(is.na(systems)) > 0))|>
  knitr::kable()

knitr::kable(colSums(is.na(systems)))

```
